verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to all the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> them, <WH6918> 'You shall be holy; for I Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> am holy. <WH6918>
<WH376>"'Each one of you shall respect <WH3372> his mother <WH517> and his father. <WH1> You shall keep <WH8104> my Sabbaths. <WH7676> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
<WH6437>"'Don't turn to idols, <WH457> nor make <WH6213> molten <WH4541> gods <WH430> for yourselves. <WH3068> I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>
<WH2076>"'When you offer a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings <WH8002> to Yahweh, <WH3068> you shall offer <WH2076> it so that you may be accepted. <WH7522>

It shall be eaten <WH398> the same day <WH3117> you offer <WH2077> it, <WH4283> and on the next day: and if anything remains <WH3498> until the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> it shall be burned <WH8313> with fire. <WH784>
If it is eaten <WH398> at all <WH398> on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> it is an abomination. <WH6292> It will not be accepted; <WH7521>

but everyone who eats <WH398> it shall bear <WH5375> his iniquity, <WH5771> because he has profaned <WH2490> the holy thing <WH6944> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and that soul <WH5315> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>

<WH7114>"'When you reap the harvest <WH7105> of your land, <WH776> you shall not wholly reap <WH3615> the corners <WH6285> of your field, <WH7704> neither shall you gather <WH3950> the gleanings <WH3951> of your harvest. <WH7105>

You shall not glean <WH5953> your vineyard, <WH3754> neither shall you gather <WH3950> the fallen grapes <WH6528> of your vineyard; <WH3754> you shall leave <WH5800> them for the poor <WH6041> and for the foreigner. <WH1616> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
<WH1589>"'You shall not steal. <WH8266>"'You shall not lie. <WH8266>"'You shall not deceive one <WH376> another. <WH5997>
<WH7650>"'You shall not swear by my name <WH8034> falsely, <WH8267> and profane <WH2490> the name <WH8034> of your God. <WH430> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH6231>"'You shall not oppress your neighbor, <WH7453> nor rob <WH1497> him. <WH6468> "'The wages of a hired <WH7916> servant shall not remain <WH3885> with you all night until the morning. <WH1242>
<WH7043>"'You shall not curse the deaf, <WH2795> nor put <WH5414> a stumbling <WH4383> block before <WH6440> the blind; <WH5787> but you shall fear <WH3372> your God. <WH430> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

<WH6213>"'You shall do no injustice <WH5766> in judgment: <WH4941> you shall not be partial <WH5375> to the <WH6440> poor, <WH1800> nor show favoritism <WH1921> to the <WH6440> great; <WH1419> but you shall judge <WH8199> your neighbor <WH5997> in righteousness. <WH6664>
<WH3212>"'You shall not go up and down as a slanderer <WH7400> among your people. <WH5971> <WH5975>"'You shall not endanger the life <WH1818> of your neighbor. <WH7453> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH8130>"'You shall not hate your brother <WH251> in your heart. <WH3824> You shall surely <WH3198> rebuke <WH3198> your neighbor, <WH5997> and not bear <WH5375> sin because of him. <WH2399>

<WH5358>"'You shall not take vengeance, nor bear any grudge <WH5201> against the children <WH1121> of your people; <WH5971> but you shall love <WH157> your neighbor <WH7453> as yourself. <WH3644> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>

<WH8104>"'You shall keep my statutes. <WH2708> <WH7250>"'You shall not crossbreed different kinds <WH3610> of animals. <WH929> <WH2232>"'you shall not sow your field <WH7704> with two kinds of seed; <WH3610> <WH5927>"'neither shall there come upon on you a garment <WH899> made of two <WH3610> kinds of material. <WH8162>

<WH376>"'If a man lies <WH7901> carnally <WH2233> with a woman <WH802> who is a slave <WH8198> girl, <WH2778> pledged to be married to another man, <WH376> and not <WH6299> ransomed, <WH6299> or given <WH5414> her freedom; <WH2668> they shall be punished. <WH1244> They shall not be put to death, <WH4191> because she was not free. <WH2666>
He shall bring <WH935> his trespass offering <WH817> to Yahweh, <WH3068> to the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> even a ram <WH352> for a trespass offering. <WH817>

The priest <WH3548> shall make atonement <WH3722> for him with the ram <WH352> of the trespass offering <WH817> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> for his sin <WH2403> which he has committed: <WH2398> and the sin <WH2403> which he has committed <WH2398> shall be forgiven him. <WH5545>

<WH935>"'When you come into the land, <WH776> and have planted <WH5193> all kinds of trees <WH6086> for food, <WH3978> then you shall count <WH6188> their fruit <WH6529> as forbidden. <WH6188> Three <WH7969> years <WH8141> shall they be forbidden <WH6189> to you. <WH398> It shall not be eaten.
But in the fourth <WH7243> year <WH8141> all its fruit <WH6529> shall be holy, <WH6944> for giving praise <WH1974> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
In the fifth <WH2549> year <WH8141> you shall eat <WH398> its fruit, <WH6529> that it may yield <WH3254> its increase <WH8393> to you. <WH3068> I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>
<WH398>"'You shall not eat any meat with the blood <WH1818> still in it; <WH5172> neither shall you use enchantments, nor practice sorcery. <WH6049>
<WH5362>"'You shall not cut the hair on the sides <WH6285> of your heads, <WH7218> neither shall you clip <WH7843> off the edge <WH6285> of your beard. <WH2206>
<WH5414>"'You shall not make any <WH3793> cuttings <WH8296> in your flesh <WH1320> for the dead, <WH5315> nor tattoo <WH5414> any marks <WH7085> on you. <WH3068> I am Yahweh.

<WH2490>"'Don't profane your daughter, <WH1323> to make her a prostitute; <WH2490> lest the land <WH776> fall to prostitution, <WH2181> and the land <WH776> become full <WH4390> of wickedness. <WH2154>
<WH8104>"'You shall keep my Sabbaths, <WH7676> and reverence <WH3372> my sanctuary; <WH4720> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH6437>"'Don't turn to those who are mediums, <WH178> nor to the wizards. <WH3049> Don't <WH1245> seek them out, <WH2930> to be defiled by them. <WH3068> I am Yahweh your God. <WH430>
<WH6965>"'You shall rise up before <WH6440> the gray head, <WH7872> and honor <WH1921> the face <WH6440> of an old man, <WH2205> and you shall fear <WH3372> your God. <WH430> I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
<WH1616>"'If a stranger lives as a foreigner <WH1616> with you in your land, <WH776> you shall not do him wrong. <WH3238>

The stranger <WH1616> who lives <WH1481> as a foreigner with you shall be to you as the native-born <WH249> among you, <WH157> and you shall love him as yourself; <WH1616> for you lived as foreigners in the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
<WH6213>"'You shall do no unrighteousness <WH5766> in judgment, <WH4941> in measures <WH4884> of length, <WH4948> of weight, or of quantity. <WH4884>

You shall have just <WH6664> balances, <WH3976> just <WH6664> weights, <WH68> a just <WH6664> ephah, <WH374> and a just <WH6664> hin. <WH1969> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> who brought you out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
<WH8104>"'You shall observe all my statutes, <WH2708> and all my ordinances, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them. <WH3068> I am Yahweh.'"
